navigation.title: Buster's Tarot Card Reader
navigation.confirmNewReading: Start a new reading? This will clear your current session.

tarot.title: Tarot Card Reading
tarot.subtitle: Three Card Spread: Past • Present • Future
tarot.questionLabel: What question do you seek guidance on?
tarot.questionHint: More context gives for a more accurate reading. Everything you write is completely private.
tarot.questionPlaceholder: What do I need to know about my career path? What concerns me? What am I hoping to understand?
tarot.focusHint: Take a moment to center yourself and focus on your question. The cards will respond to your energy.
tarot.shufflingHint: Focus on your question as the cards align with your energy
tarot.clickToRevealPast: Click to turn over the Past card
tarot.clickToRevealPresent: Click to turn over the Present card
tarot.clickToRevealFuture: Click to turn over the Future card
tarot.whatDoYouSee: What do you see in the {position} card?
tarot.interpretationPrompt: Before I share the traditional interpretation, what springs to mind when you look at this card? What catches your attention in relation to your question?
tarot.interpretationPlaceholder: Share your thoughts... what do you notice? what feelings arise?
tarot.diviningHint: Weaving the threads of past, present, and future into your story

errors.enterQuestion: Please enter your question or focus
errors.shareOrSkip: Please share your interpretation or click "Skip" to get the reading directly
errors.connectionError: Unable to connect to the reading service. Please check your API key and try again.
errors.connectionErrorShort: Unable to connect to the reading service.
